name: Vaadin.NumberFieldElement

properties.name: hasControls
properties.description: Set to true to display value increase/decrease controls.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the field.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the field.

properties.name: step
properties.description: Specifies the allowed number intervals of the field.

description:
`<vaadin-number-field>` is a Polymer 2 element for number field control in forms.

```html
<vaadin-number-field label="Number">
</vaadin-number-field>
```
